resource "aws_key_pair" "my-key" {
  key_name   = "my-key"
  public_key = "ssh-rsa  jose.mundin@cluster2go.com.br"
}

resource "aws_security_group" "allow_ssh" {
  name = "allow_ssh"

  ingress {
    from_port = 22
    to_port = 22
    protocol = "tcp"
    cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  egress {
    from_port = 0
    to_port = 0
    protocol = -1
    cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
  }
}
